title: Risk Factors For Severe Illness From Respiratory Viruses
content:
Making a plan
If you or someone around you has one or more risk factors for severe illness, using the prevention strategies described in CDC's
Respiratory Virus Guidance
is especially important. In addition, there are several specific considerations for people with certain risk factors for severe illness:
Older adults
Young children
People with weakened immune systems
People with disabilities
Pregnant women
